sentence.text: Several studies have investigated single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in a number of genes associated with the susceptibility to or severity and outcome of community-acquired pneumonia (positive regulation of transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter), but no research has yet been conducted on the role of response to peptidoglycan gene polymorphisms in CAP.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter
